TopicTitle: Asteroid Redirect Mission in LEGO? YES!

Articles.Content:
I recently found a nice model of ARM in LEGO ... mind if NASA decides veramnete achieve it ... let's try us! I have already voted! ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

[https://ideas.lego.com/projects/100260](https://ideas.lego.com/projects/100260)

![11038247_10204064247432819_430328190910373124_n.jpg?oh=f2a09aeb825caa5863cfcf12ced86f4a&oe=55308D32&__gda__=1429228857_1349d97039614196a20a734b95c106a2](https://fbcdn-sphotos-h-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xpf1/v/t34.0-12/11038247_10204064247432819_430328190910373124_n.jpg?oh=f2a09aeb825caa5863cfcf12ced86f4a&oe=55308D32&__gda__=1429228857_1349d97039614196a20a734b95c106a2)

Ok, I admit I made it. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-15T15:40:21Z" title="04/15/2015 03:40  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 15, 2015</time> by Spock1108**
Considering how much success they had with Space exploration themes back in the 80's, an entire product line of REAL vehicles would be sweet!

> 
> Considering how much success they had with Space exploration themes back in the 80's, an entire product line of REAL vehicles would be sweet!

They did make models based on real life vehicles and still do up until today.

Oh I can't count the many times the Space Shuttle was re-released from Lego.

It must be about a dozen times now!

Hmm.. now I feel like collecting them...

> 
> They did make models based on real life vehicles and still do up until today.
> Oh I can't count the many times the Space Shuttle was re-released from Lego.
> 
> It must be about a dozen times now!

The shuttle model is the only one I can remember.
